attributes.action: LIMITIATION OF FIREWORKS IMPORTED/RETAILEd IN THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To introduce a limit of fireworks allowed to enter the uk/the number of fireworks sold in the uk. With this in force i believe that it will push the price of the fireworks up and also limit the number sold. It may encourage the "fire work season" to return to 1 day of the year instead of the 2 weeks either side of 5th of november. The limitation of number would also reduce injurys and encourage general members to go to "organised displays" 
I hope that you can give the problem of the "firewoks " the attention it deserves
